701673f-b.text:
Purdy Street, north from Parker Street.  In the background appears St. Raymond's Roman Catholic Church, situated at the S.W. corner of E. Tremont Avenue and Castle Hill Avenue.
View 1: April 10, 1938
View 2: September 4, 1939
P. L. Speer

This area became part of Parkchester Houses. View 2 shows a concrete mixer during construction operations.
701673f-b.folder: Purdy Street & Parker Street, Bronx, NY
